simple.name: Simple
simple.desc: The program has a visible, cartoon icon in the Net.

contextual.name: Contextual
contextual.desc: The program has a Net ICON about the graphic level of a high-res computer image.

fractal.name: Fractal
fractal.desc: The program has somewhat realistic Net ICON, with shading, texture and sensation.

photorealistic.name: Photorealistic
photorealistic.desc: The program has a very realistic ICON about the level of a good video image or movie.

superrealistic.name: Superrealistic
superrealistic.desc: The program has an ICON that looks like a real person or object.
